channel.title: HeavenScape
channel.description:
[size=24pt][b]Project HeavenScape[/b][/size] ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- I am starting a server called "HeavenScape". Currently I haven't done much on the server yet. I'm beginning today, and am just looking for people who could help me. The server is based off a Blank Source. Not something like PI everyone uses. I am going to try to code everything from just a source with the basic things. I'm really getting disappointed when I see everyone just leeching PI. I am going to try to make a good server like 2-3 years ago. Also no things like "Donator" or "Vote 4 Cash". ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- I guess it'll be kinda useless if i post pictures becasue I haven't done much yet. The only thing you would see on the pictures will be empty places. ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- Spots: Coders: 1/2 (Coder = currently only me) Hosters: 0/1 Client Coders: 1/1 As you can see I don't need many people. ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- Application form:
Name: Age: Your Timezone: Msn: Why you want to join:
- Someone2

item.title: HeavenScape
item.dc:creator: @Sins_World Sins World
item.description:
@Sins_World wrote:

Name: Austin
Age: 14
Your Timezone: Centeral
Msn: austin_clay_newton@hotmail.com
Why you want to join: I want to join because lately i’ve been coding for a hoster and i dont really like the hoster, he cant host 24/7 and i mean he only hosts mostly at night… so i quit coding for him and i want to try something new. So i was wondering if i could try out/Become 1 of ur server developers.
Thanks, Bye!!(:

Read full topic

item.title: HeavenScape
item.dc:creator: @someone2 someone2
item.description:
@someone2 wrote:

[size=24pt]Project HeavenScape[/size]

I am starting a server called “HeavenScape”.

Currently I haven’t done much on the server yet. I’m beginning today, and am just looking for people who could help me. The server is based off a Blank Source.

Not something like PI everyone uses. I am going to try to code everything from just a source with the basic things. I’m really getting disappointed when I see everyone just leeching PI. I am going to try to make a good server like 2-3 years ago. Also no things like “Donator” or “Vote 4 Cash”.

I guess it’ll be kinda useless if i post pictures becasue I haven’t done much yet. The only thing you would see on the pictures will be empty places.

Spots:

Coders: 1/2 (Coder = currently only me)
Hosters: 0/1
Client Coders: 1/1

As you can see I don’t need many people.

Application form:
